it.sauronsoftware.ftp4j.connectors

Class HTTPTunnelConnector

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.sauronsoftware.ftp4j.connectors.HTTPTunnelConnector
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    FTPConnector

    public class HTTPTunnelConnector
extends java.lang.Object
implements FTPConnector
    This one connects a remote ftp host via a HTTP 1.1 proxy which allows tunneling through the HTTP CONNECT method.
    Author:
    Carlo Pelliccia
